features: Durable Plastic Pocket Folder: KTRIO folders with pockets are made of high-quality pp material, which ensures frequent use. Featuring 2 pockets and 3 prongs, these plastic folders with pockets and prongs are durable and water-resistant to protect all your information. High-quality plastic folders.

Clear Front Pocket Design: Our pocket folders feature a top-loading transparent pocket on the front that allows for complete customization of your folder for your school schedule or personal preference. This helps you identify the types of internal documents more quickly and improves your work or learning efficiency.

Large Capacity and Package Includes: The plastic folders measure 9.4 x 11.5 inches, which can hold a large amount of loose documents and hole-punched papers. 3 prong fasteners make the punched file easily and efficiently fixed in the file folder, 50+ pages capacity. You will get 4 brightly colored heavy-duty folders with clear front pocket. Our folders with pockets provide you with more storage space to store different documents.

Bright Colors and Versatile Use: The pocket file folders come in 4 classic colors including blue, yellow, green and red. The assorted colors allow you to easily distinguish function, purpose, or categories. Manage files better. Widely used in school, home, and office.

Good Customer Service: The 3 prong folders with pockets can keep your most important documents organized and in place. If you have any quality issues about these folders with pockets, please feel free to contact us. Respond within 12 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use file folders for everything from genealogy research to keeping my dog's medical records in order. With this set I can color code according to family for genealogy. The clear front pocket makes this folder a clear winner! With the three prongs for three-hole punch paper in addition to the two pockets, this makes a great choice for school reports, too. Having built-in business card slots also makes it work as a sales presentation/business folder. It is versatile and the plastic provides a measure of protection from the elements...or spilled coffee.Overall, this is a nice set of folders. I will be ordering more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for elementary school aged kids!
reviews.reviewText: So I don’t know how it is in other states/counties but so far at my daughter’s elementary school all the grades ask for these specific colored 3-ring pocket folders and let me tell you our local Walmarts and Targets are always out of them come back to school time. So being able to get a couple of these is gold! Quality is comparable to the Target brand. I’m one very happy mom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Durable Plastic Folders
reviews.reviewText: This is a set of 16 durable plastic folders in 4 different colors. The plastic is thick and, even for my 5th grade students, takes some real effort to destroy.The colors are bright and vivid. They do not fade over time.The exterior of the front cover has a plastic sleeve that can be filled with whatever you’d like to personalize the folder.The interior of the folders has several nice features: there are 2 pockets to store papers in, there are prongs to fully attach papers, and there is an area along each pocket to store a smaller piece of paper, such as a small name card or business card.I love the durability of these folders. Anything that can last an entire year (or more) with 10 and 11 year olds has my vote!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good folders for organizing paperwork
reviews.reviewText: These plastic folders are handy for organizing paperwork.They are durable folders and can hold quite a bit of papers in them. I'd estimate at least 50 sheets of paper per side of the folder.The folder comes with several features:-3 hole prongs-business card holder-compartment for a title page/labelThe 3 hole prongs work but cannot hold much paper. Maybe 15 sheets of paper at most. The prongs themselves seem like they may break off after a few uses.The business card holder sufficiently held my business cards in place.The area for a title/label was a bit challenging to get one piece of paper in at one pass. I needed to pull it out and straighten it out a few times before it was aligned right. I do not know what a solution would be other than to have a open/close mechanism, but that just seems like too much for the type of product this is.Overall, good product for keeping paperwork organized and in one place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great plastic folders with front pocket
reviews.reviewText: These are really nice folders at a good price! They have a clear front pocket, so you can add a customized label sheet and then reuse it without having to remove sticky labels. These are always hard to find in different colors, at the beginning of each school year, so I always stock up when I can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are exactly as described. They're a durable plastic folder with a clear pocket on the front. Exactly what I was expecting and exactly what I got. They are a good quality that feels like they'll last for quite a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars stronger than paper
reviews.reviewText: These are good portfolio folders-- they do what they are supposed to do. The plastic covers are not unusually thick; they are thin, as I expected. But they are more durable than paper folders, which is why I got them. The clear plastic shoot affixed to the front is a nice extra. Best of all, these were inexpensive. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Well made, professional, colorful! Perfect for projects or creating professional documents for presentations.
